Datasets

Europeana is a database of some 30 million cultural and historical documents, images, sound and video files from Europe's museums, libraries, galleries and archives.

Filter by:

  • Archaeology
  • Natural History
  • Photographs
  • Prints
  • Drawings
  • Maps
  • History
  • Architecture
  • Suggest a Dataset
  • Help improve this content

  • Maps and Drawings from the Biblioteca Virtual Del Patrimonio Bibliográfico

    More than 4,000 maps and drawings from the Biblioteca Virtual del Patrimonio Bibliográfico. Spanish language.

    Dataset provided by Biblioteca Virtual del Patrimonio Bibliográfico. Contact ccbae.dglab@mcu.es for more details.

    View this data in:
    Portal API Console
    links Maps Drawings History

  • Drawings, Prints and Artwork from the National Library of Poland

    More than 16,000 examples of drawings, prints, artwork, posters, engravings, postcards, photographs, portraits and caricatures from the National Library of Poland. Polish language.

    Dataset provided by The National Library of Poland - Biblioteka Narodowa. Contact biblnar@bn.org.pl for more details.

    View this data in:
    Portal API Console
    links Photographs Prints Drawings
